motifStack 1.43.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • motifStack Vignette

    convert pfm object to PWM

    pfm2pwm.Rd

    convert pfm object to PWM

    pfm2pwm(x, N = 10000)

    Arguments

    x

    an object of pfm or pcm or matrix

    N

    Total number of event counts used for pfm generation.

    Value

    A numeric matrix representing the Position Weight Matrix for PWM.

    See also

    PWM

    Author

    Jianhong Ou

    Examples

    
library("MotifDb")
#> Loading required package: BiocGenerics
#> 
#> Attaching package: ‘BiocGenerics’
#> The following object is masked from ‘package:motifStack’:
#>

#>     duplicated, eval, evalq, get, grep, grepl, intersect, is.unsorted,
#>     lapply, mapply, match, mget, order, paste, pmax, pmax.int, pmin,
#>     pmin.int, rank, rbind, rownames, sapply, setdiff, sort, table,
#>     tapply, union, unique, unsplit, which.max, which.min
#> Loading required package: S4Vectors

#> The following object is masked from ‘package:base’:

matrix.fly <- query(MotifDb, "Dmelanogaster")
pfm2pwm(matrix.fly[[1]])
